entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Expose options to only generate one direction for generated COM interfaces #86360
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Implement IDirectoryContents on PhysicalDirectoryInfo at MS.Extensions.FileProviders.Physical #86354
  • New/update dump diagnostic IPC command that streams the dump on diagnostic IPC channel #86350
  • .NET 6 Android, The certificate data cannot be read with the provided password, the password may be incorrect #86349
  • Config binder source-gen: .NET 7 app fails to compile with .NET 8 preview 4 package #86348
    8.0.0
  • Consider decomposing `GetElement(memory, ...)` into equivalent nodes #86345
    Future
  • Analyzer and Code-Fix to enable easy adoption of `[GeneratedComInterface]` #86343
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Consider changing return types of new throw helpers #86341
    8.0.0
  • [6.0] CI failure: System.Globalization.Tests.NumberFormatInfoMiscTests.DigitSubstitutionListTest(cultureName: "prs", shape: NativeNational) expected Context #86338
    8.0.0
  • Config binder source-gen: ensure property setters are called even when there's no matching config value. #86333
    8.0.0
  • X509Certificate2.CreateFromPem private key lost after import #86328
    Future
  • Regressions in System.IO.Compression.Brotli #86335
  • Regressions in System.Buffers.Text.Tests.Base64EncodeDecodeInPlaceTests #86336
  • [mono][aot] Loader tests failing on CI with Mono LLVM FullAOT #86327
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][node] Test failures on System.Net.Http.Functional #86326
  • CI build failure: Bash exited with code '1' failure - Could NOT find ZLIB #86324
    8.0.0
  • Proxy authentication not recognized in macOS #86322
  • [wasm][node] Test timeouts on System.Net.Http.Functional #86317
  • [8.0.100-preview.5.23264.1] Fail to launch Flow.Launcher app with System.NotSupportedException Exception #86308
  • Invalid IL produced by unreachable code blocks optimization #86304
  • macOS codesign should be platform independent #86301
    Future

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Provide an Stream abstraction centered on best-practices #79261
    8.0.0
  • Use PoolingAsyncValueTaskMethodBuilder for System.Net.Http.HttpConnection async reads #81318
    8.0.0
  • Decide on linker to use in runtime builds #84794
  • Assertion failed 'GenTree::OperIsCommutative(oper)' during 'Generate code' #59916
    Future
  • JIT arm32: Assertion failed 'refPosition->RegOptional()' in 'System.Numerics.Tests.ComplexTests:Abs(double,double)' during 'LSRA build intervals' when using non-standard arg sort #76382
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'refPosition->RegOptional()' during 'LSRA build intervals' #85627
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: _Avx512F_VL_Vector128_ro::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86._Avx512F_VL_Vector128.Program.ShiftRightArithmeticInt641() #86267
    8.0.0
  • [android] Mono AOT compiler fails in main/.NET 8 Preview 5 #85940
  • [mono] FullAOT compilation of Microsoft.iOS.dll crashes with managed static registrar #86264
    8.0.0
  • Add Ubuntu 22.10 kinetic kudu RIDs #84974
  • [TestFailure] System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Tests.MetricEventSourceTests.EventSourcePublishesAllDataTypes #85290
    8.0.0
  • Gradual regression of System.Buffers.Tests.ReadOnlySequenceTests<Char>.IterateGetPositionArray from net6.0 to net7.0-rc2 #77028
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Collections.Tests.Perf_BitArray and System.Collections.IndexerSet<Int32> #66769
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Collections.CtorFromCollection<Int32> #84900
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: Mismatch in align instruction #85839
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2181920 #86361
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #86359
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #86358
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • {U}Int128 support for Utf8Formatter/Parser #86357
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix incorrect usage of u16_strcmp instead of u16_strncmp #86356
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [6.0-staging] Update some Windows server helix queues for mono #86355
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, runtime-mono
  • Fix mapping of redeclared type parameters #86353
    needs-area-label
  • Add ProcessStartInfo constructor that accepts IEnumerable<string> arguments #86346
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Add tests for diagnostics, and copy attributes from base methods to generated shadowing methods #86344
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Attempt to fix unfailing helix test run when testResults.xml are missing #86342
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix DAC syncblk API so the SOS tests stop failing intermittently #86339
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Remove System.Reflection wrappers from the STJ source generator. #86334
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Set WasmEnableWebcil to true by default #86330
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix debug compile error in mono mini #86329
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm][node] Disable System.Net.Http.Functional with timeouts #86321
    arch-wasm, disabled-test
  • [LoongArch64] delete the rsGetRsvdReg() for LA64. #86319
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve constant folding for some frozen objects #86318
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Exclude unused bundle files in AppleAppBuilder #86316
    area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Exclude profiler/r2r tests from building #86314
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fill out array bounds in metadata transform #86313
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Enable exception handling runtime tests on Interpreter #86307
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • [lib][tests] Globalization comparison tests cleanup #86305
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Initial build configuration for Haiku #86303
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] Reset OOB packages from 7.0.7 #86300
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0-staging] Reset OOB packages from 6.0.18 #86299
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • fix the regs conflicts within the `addResolution` for LoongArch64 and RISC-V. #86294
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Lots of tweaks to FrozenDictionary/Set analysis and hashing #86293
    area-System.Collections
  • Delay reg free for tbx_1reg #86292
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • StringBuilder: use Span.Fill in Append repeating char #86287
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Support remaining collections in config binder generator #86285
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging] Bump branding to 6.0.19 #86298
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0-staging] Bump branding to 7.0.8 #86297
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Revert "[6.0-staging] Reset OOB packages from 6.0.17 (#84598)" #86351
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Revert "[7.0-staging] Reset OOB packages from 7.0.6 (#84600)" #86352
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [manual] Merge release/7.0-staging into release/7.0 #86296
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 7.0.7
  • [manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #86295
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 6.0.18
  • Pooled async value task for HTTP 1 connection #81426
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix ReadOnlySpanGetReferenceAndReadInteger on BigEndian #2 #86323
    area-System.Memory
  • Clean up some code after the interface inheritance work #86347
  • Constrained mask should take into account busy registers #85933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clean up dead code in illink targets #85741
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • Write the generated file header to the ComInterfaceGenerator-generated files #86283
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Webcil-in-WebAssembly #85932
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Ensure that INS_TT_MEM128 is correctly handled #86331
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Stop testing UnregisterFrozenSegment #86279
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add -DCLI_CMAKE_FALLBACK_OS in CMakeSettings.json #86261
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete some dead code #86337
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Improve the handling of ToScalar and GetElement(0) #86209
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] just skip the array type. #86290
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • MetricEventSource tests workaround .NET Framework double rounding #86286
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • Implement GetNonRuntimeDeterminedTypeFromRuntimeDeterminedSubtypeViaSubstitution #86310
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix handling of non-beforefieldinit interface cctors #86311
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Account for rank 1 array special casing in RyuJIT #86312
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add Ubuntu 23.10 (Mantic Minotaur) RIDs to .NET 6 #86309
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 6.0.18
  • Add Ubuntu 23.10 (Mantic Minotaur) RIDs to .NET 7 #86306
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 7.0.7
  • [LoongArch64] fix the conflicts within the DIV/MOD. #86289
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update references to ILLink tool name #86315
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono][debugger][docs] How we run debugger tests #86325
    documentation, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono] Prevent memory corruption when decoding UCO entry point #86266
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [browser] fix lint issues #86155
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Remove Architecture Property #86277
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • GetChromeVersions task: Try to find older versions, if the latest one is #86184
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Start runing CctorForWrite test #86302
    needs-area-label
  • [browser] Load appsettings to VFS #85520
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Enable runtime tests on Interpreter #86097
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] WBT: Re-enable blazor run test #86268
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Interface inheritance follow up #85117
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [7.0-staging] Reset OOB packages from 7.0.6 #84600
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [6.0-staging] Reset OOB packages from 6.0.17 #84598
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Unmark loop align regardless if we found block to align or not #86198
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Intrinsics analyzer and fixes #85481
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add Ubuntu 22.10 kinetic kudu RIDs for .NET 6 #84983
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] add RID for Alpine 3.18 #86284
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add Ubuntu 22.10 kinetic kudu RIDs for .NET 7 #84984
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] add RID for Alpine 3.18 #86280
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Microsoft.NETCore.Platforms: support adding rids with '-' in the base part (backport #84413) #84442
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] Microsoft.NETCore.Platforms: support adding rids with '-' in the base part. #86282
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Wasm] Adjust error message for .NET 7 assemblies, JSExport and multi-threading #86197
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution

Updated

  • Tune inliner for callees with pinvokes #86362
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SHA3 #84132
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Delete `GT_ASG` #85871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Fix issue with hoisting and copy prop interaction #85493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add marshallers for GeneratedComInterface-based types #86177
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Share ILCompiler logic #85783
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

    area-System.Net.Quic

    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-16
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Merge 15 may 23 #2275

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Prepare the compiler for multithreaded execution #2272
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement unhandled exception handling #2274

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • In .NET 8 Preview 4, dotnet new update command fails to check template updates for preview version packages #32580
  • How gets `RunArguments` property evaluated? #32551
  • [NETSDKE2E]With .NET 8 preview 5 SDK installed, the help description for "--sc, --self-contained" option should be updated as the default is 'false' now if a runtime identifier is specified. #32549
  • JsonConvert.DeserializeObject for non-English languages #32548

Closed

  • .NET 8 Preview 5: Android Release builds no longer work #32539

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #32584
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #32583
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Trusted roots: 2023-04 #32574
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • workload from rollback file for tests #32567
    arch-wasm, Area-AspNetCore, .NET 8.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32544
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/7.0.2xx] Trusted roots: 2023-04 #32573
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Trusted roots: 2023-04 #32575
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Trusted roots: 2023-04 #32572
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Trusted roots: 2023-04 #32571
  • Support side by side workload manifests in SDK resolver #32471
    untriaged
  • Trusted roots: 2023-04 CTL #32564
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Convert the DotnetCommand that call "new" to DotnetNewCommand #32517
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create README.md for CTLs #32529
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32503
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Fix incorrect sln add generation #11846
  • #24909 Add condition for System.NET.http to work for Multitargeting .NETFramework #32504
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make GeneratePublishDependencyFile incremental #32305
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Enable EventSourceSupport in ASP.NET Native AOT apps #32538
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Partial class implementing identically named file interfaces with identically named members should not confuse them #68219
  • Update Contributing.md to set more clear expectations #68209
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException in ReplacePropertyWithMethodsCodeRefactoringProvider #68207
  • Add an analyzer to warn about redundant null forgiving operators #68204
  • When git is pulled, the code prompts an error #68202
  • SyntaxExtensions.NormalizeWhitespace mangles comments and clobbers code #68201

Closed

  • Function pointer tests breaking on .NET 8 #68208
    17.7
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33716.03 #68205

PullRequests

Created

  • Mark 17.6 APIs as shipped #68221
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Update Contributing.md #68220
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Add design for interceptors with nonzero arity #68218
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move LongPath check to MSBuild target #68217
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #68216
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Lazily calculate preview operations #68214
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove InterceptableAttribute #68213
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure proper handling of generic SynthesizedGlobalMethodSymbol. #68211
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Cleanup refactorings around method-flags and body info. #68210
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle null compilation options in IsCandidateForFullSolutionAnalysis #68206
    Area-IDE, Tenet-Reliability, untriaged
  • Add support for ref returning methods and properties in `With` statement. #68203
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Locals and Returns, untriaged
  • Sync C# required members implementation with VB changes #68200
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members

Merged

  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into InlineArrays #68215
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix function pointer expected output on coreclr #68212
    Area-Compilers, Test, Feature - Function Pointers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #68198
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Pack bits in SourceOrdinaryMethodSymbol into an existing bitflag structure we have for all source methods #68158
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Bot rules for stale issues and PRs #67684
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use net8.0 runtime for InlineArray tests #68190
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Only pack the shipping/non-shipping nupkgs for roslyn #67679
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Remove all fields from SourceOrdinaryMethodSymbol in the common case. #68135
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Initial support for dictionary collection literals #68197
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve parsing of switch expressions whith missing `}` or `]` #67943
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Validate InlineArrayAttribute applications on types in source. #68195
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Additional work to release unused PreviewWorkspace memory #68054
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allow parsing `ref readonly` modifier #68164
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor breaking change in 7.0.302 SDK? #48267
  • Update Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Features nuget package #48266
  • MSAL on Blazor WebAssembly refresh token expiration invalid_grant regression #48264
  • Random slow response time when application low load #48262
  • EmailAddress data annotation should be able to validate emails without needing extra regex. #48260
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #48255
  • Virtualize ItemsProvider work incorrectly and causes blink #48254
    Backlog

Closed

  • Support binding from types defined with an `AsParameters` attribute #46336
    8.0-preview5
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #48232
  • Minimal API - improve Parameter Binding, allow validation of query parameters #48261
  • we can't upload the directory(folder) in InputFile component #48257
  • Add generic versions of attributes in ASP.NET Core #37767
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Support metadata generation in RequestDelegate generator #46277
    8.0-preview5
  • API Proposal RoutingStateProvider; RouteData breaking change #47854
    8.0-preview5
  • Uncaught (in promise) Error: Found malformed component comment at Blazor: #48123
  • Perf improvement: mapaction, single_query #48160
  • Perf regression: plainTextSansFilter #48245
  • Review use of null suppression operator in RDG #47771
    8.0-preview5
  • Build error when using RDG with a route handler that returns a type explicitly implementing IResult #47462
    8.0-preview5

PullRequests

Created

  • Ship Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities, Microsoft.Net.Http.Headers as packages #48265
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime
  • Update CredScanSuppressions.json after DataProtection move #48263
    area-infrastructure
  • DOM merging #48258
    area-blazor
  • Print exit code when trim test fails #48253
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Remove rules associated with the auto-merge label #48227
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Add generic variants of MVC attributes #47075
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview5
  • Change namespace for `RootComponentMetadata` and `ComponentTypeMetadata` #48256
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview5
  • Allow declaring render modes, and emit the corresponding markers into HTML #48190
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview5
  • Add support for IResults with explicit interface implementations #48250
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview5

Updated

  • Avoid delegate shuffle thunks in StringUtilities #48234
    area-runtime
  • Add IHttpSysRequestTimingFeature to support accessing http.sys timing info #48218
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Skip counter measurement when start listening while processing #48045
    area-runtime, area-signalr
  • Load configuration in UseHttps #48138
    area-runtime
  • Improve endpoint metadata debugging #48207
    area-runtime
  • Replace ISystemClock with TimeProvider in Kestrel #48081
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel, 8.0-preview5
  • Add dependency injection support for object pools #48217
    area-runtime
  • Updated the AddPolicyRegistry extension methods to use TryAdd and TryAddEnumerable internally #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update SDK #48252
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-16
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • dumpasync --methodtable result in error when parameter are not prefix with the 0x (hex) sign #3137
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Grid ColV isn't constrained to row #15121
  • Rotating an image with an animation results in a wobble #15116
  • ColumnSpacing docs incorrect #15115
  • UITests TODOS #15113
    .NET 8
  • CollectionView: IsVisible - expand selected rows fails on iOS #15112
  • ShouldShowToolbarButton() override on FlyoutPage not working #15111
  • ResourceDictionary.ContainsKey method is not working correctly #15110
  • ITransform perspective rotation inconsistent on different platforms. #15108
  • Add ImageSpan for FormattedString in Label #15107
  • [Windows] Combination of Frame and Grid with too big content (Text or Path) will cause Xaml.UnhandledException #15106
    Backlog
  • Star columns not computed correctly when ScrollView spans across all of them #15105
  • Failed to AOT compile while building iOS IPA and using Microsoft.Maui.Essentials NuGet package in a class library #15104
  • iOS issue tabbar having 6 tabs, On the 6th tab, button click having Shell.Current.GoToAsync to show new page, not working #15103
  • NavHost cannot be null on Back key pressed #15102
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio 2022 not installing MAUI properly, cannot find MAUI workload, project unloaded #15100

Closed

  • SwipeGestureRecognizer is not working #7403
  • Unconstrained * rows/columns in Grid may expand when they should not #14694
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.3.8149] Regression in grid layouts in .NET 8 #14818
    .NET 8
  • MAUI Navigation Stack null item bug #15101
  • Grid row not sizing correctly with * when the content is a collectionview on iOS #15092
  • [Android] [Scenario Day] CarouselView freeze trying to use Spacing #7253
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Android] ListView with ItemsSource ObservableCollection crashes on item removal #7311
  • CollectionView Crash when clearing & adding data second time. #7343
    Backlog
  • ListView item size differences Windows/Android #7312
  • Databinding FontImageSource.Glyph doesn't update #7383
    Backlog
  • Changing the theme has no effect on some controls (only in release) #11510
    Backlog
  • [Shapes] Path render wrong position #7700

PullRequests

Created

  • Add full list of MAUI versions to bug-report issue template #15120
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨
  • Tests and fixes to verify that spanned views are including spacing in measurements #15119
    area/layout 🔲
  • Android gallery fixes #15118
  • [workload] add metadata about .NET 6 EOL #15117
    area/setup 🪄
  • Fix contentview rtl #15114
    area/layout 🔲
  • Ensure "text boxes" preserve cursor location #15099
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry

Merged

  • [uitests] Work for get appium uitests with CI #14488
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Handle Grid * expansion when size is larger than minimum, but less than sufficient to display full size #14902
    area/layout 🔲, layout-grid
  • Fix up Compatibility gallery #15020
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1722.45 to 1.0.1774.30 #14994
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • [ios] fix memory leak in Image #15062
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️
  • Make CollectionView on iOS measure to content size #14951
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Add visual testing support, on top of Appium #14999
    area/testing
  • Remove incorrect call to `DisconnectHandler` #15036
  • [Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing #14861
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, community ✨
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.14.2.1 to 4.15.1 #15089
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • Android: fix dialog button colors in dark mode #15091
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-dialogalert
  • Use PrependToMapping method to replace Window MapTitle method #15041
  • Move some controls to use ModifyMapping #15058
  • Use AppendToMapping for Focus commands #15040
  • Fixed removing items from the shell causing a crash #15098
    area/shell 🐢

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to disable any conventions related to relationship discovery? #30906
  • Concatenating multiple IQueryable<T>'s causes "EmptyProjectionMember" exception on the InMemory database #30905
    Backlog
  • [Sqlite] `PRAGMA journal_mode=WAL;` no work! #30900
  • EFCore 7 - Some JSON GIT tests removed from EFCore 7? #30899

Closed

  • Fixes for each Patch version (EF Core 6) #30904
  • IMaterializationInterceptor failing when using JSON owned type #30903
  • How to insert item without track by EFCore #30901
  • EFCore 7 - JSON types- Inserting custom value for DateTime field in JSON column #30892
  • When using SplitToTable cannot use json column #30874
  • Will Microsoft.EntityFramework.Sqlite have speed improvements in net 8 #30870
  • MAUI Android app crash with Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite >= 6.0.12 #30867
  • 7.0.5 nuget Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite copies wrong version of SQLitePCLRaw.core.dll #30863
  • Specific attribute not getting generated in cosmos db when creating objects #30824
  • Converting values to primitive types in primitive collections #30893
  • Result not materialized using `DbSet<T>FromSql()` with json column #30887
  • Performance issue while querying for a high page number. #30861
  • Shadow foreign key in self referencing table involved in many-to-many relationship with named join table throws IndexOutOfRangeException #30840
  • Azure Pipeline, dotnet ef migrations bundle, fails when 'assemblyVersion' defined #30879

PullRequests

Created

  • Correct parentheses logic for SQLite JsonScalarExpression #30908
  • Address design meeting feedback #30907

Merged

  • Update SDK #30898
  • Stop skipping shadow skip navigation slots when creating the shadow values array #30902

Updated

  • Add support for DATA_COMPRESSION and SORT_IN_TEMPDB SQL Server index options #30831
  • Add analyzer/codefix for usage of interpolated strings in raw query methods #30835
